title: Design Smart Clothing Architecture
description: Define the overall design and structure of the smart clothing, including sensors placement, power source, communication methods, and data processing.

title: Develop Temperature Monitoring Sensor
description: Design and build a sensor that can measure the wearer's body temperature accurately.

title: Develop Vital Signs Monitoring Sensor
description: Design and build a sensor that can monitor the wearer's vital signs in real-time.

title: Develop Power Source for Smart Clothing
description: Create a power source that can efficiently and safely power the sensors and other components of the smart clothing.

title: Develop Real-time Data Processing System
description: Create a system that can process the data from the sensors in real-time and provide useful insights.

title: Develop Mobile Application for Data Visualization
description: Create a mobile application that allows users to visualize the data collected by the smart clothing.

title: Test and Validate Smart Clothing Prototype
description: Perform thorough testing and validation of the smart clothing prototype to ensure it meets all requirements.
dependencies: Develop Power Source for Smart Clothing
Develop Mobile Application for Data Visualization

title: Revise and Approve Final Design Documentation
description: Review the final design documentation and provide necessary approvals.
dependencies: Test and Validate Smart Clothing Prototype
